name: Climb The Skies
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

Climb to the top of the world, up to the clouds, in search of a ladder leading to the heavens. On your journey, you will encounter green, poisonous liquid. You want to avoid it by jumping over it because the poisonous liquid will turn you into a zombie as soon as you touch it. Once you are a zombie, you have just 15 seconds left to complete your journey. 

Basic controls for a platformer; Left & Right/A&D to move left and right, Space to Jump, Up & Down/W&S to climb ladders, and r to restart the game.
